content: sweet oddity art marshmallow the penguin crochet pattern https //www etsy com/shop/sweetoddityart copyright 2023 of sweet oddity art you are not allowed to sell this pattern you are not allowed to distribute or publish this pattern in any form you are not allowed to alter this pattern in any form sweet oddity art 1 pattern details size 12 inches from bottom to top of head with weight 6 yarn and a 3 75 mm hook skill level needed intermediate- suitable for novice crocheters requires patience and precisions when assembling the penguin and basic crochet skills contact info if you have any questions or concerns about this pattern please do not hesitate to contact me i will get back to you within 24 hours sweetoddityart@gmail com https //www etsy com/shop/sweetoddityart materials needed yarn bulky weight #6 approximately 150g of main color and 50g of accent colors worsted weight yarn #4 for hat color a teal color b white color c variegated color d yellow hook size f hook or 3 75 mm d hook or 3 25 mm 23 mm safety eyes scissors sewing needle stitch marker fiberfill stuffing abbreviations magic_ring= magic_ring- crochet single_crochet stitches in to the adjustable loop blo= back loops only chain= chain stitch f/o= fasten_off single_crochet= single_crochet stitch half_double_crochet= half_double_crochet bob st= bobble stitch sl= slip_stitch flo= front loops only double_crochet= double_crochet stitch inc3= 3 single_crochet in the same stitch increase= increase- make two single_crochet stitches in the same stitch decrease=decrease- crochet two stitches together using the decrease method 4 single_crochet increase x 6= repeat the pattern between parentheses 6 times notes do not join rounds unless stated work in a continuous spiral use a stitch marker to mark the beginning of each round all stitches are worked in both loops unless stated otherwise in the pattern sweet oddity art 2 head and body crocheted from top of head to bottom starting with color a chain 2 1 work 12 single_crochet into the 2nd chain from hook= 12 2 increase in each st around= 24 3 3 single_crochet increase x 6= 30 4 single_crochet in each st around 5 color a 4 single_crochet increase color b 2 single_crochet mark your 1st blo stitch with a marker color a blo 2 single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet back to both loops color b 2 single_crochet color a increase 4 single_crochet increase x 3= 36 6 color a 5 single_crochet color b skip 1 st increase in next st 10 single_crochet color a 19 single_crochet 7 color a 4 single_crochet color b skip 1 st increase in next st 12 single_crochet color a 18 single_crochet 8 color a 4 single_crochet color b 14 single_crochet color a 18 single_crochet 9 color a single_crochet increase x 3 color b increase x 3 8 single_crochet increase x 3 color a increase x 3 15= 48 10 color a 7 single_crochet color b 20 single_crochet color a 21 single_crochet 11 color a 8 single_crochet color b 18 single_crochet color a
